description.raw:
[DART 4.0 has been released](https://github.com/dartsim/dart/releases/tag/v4.0). It improves support for universal and screw joints (partial fixes to #1096, #1011), joint springs (partial fix for #975) and complete fixes for #910, #1079, #1174.

DART 4.0 has a lot of API changes, so merging this pull request will make DART 4.0 the minimum required version. There is a minor ABI breakage in DARTLink.hh, but I have targeted this to the gazebo_3.1 branch since we have not yet released any debian packages that link against dart. If people think this is a bad idea, I will re-target to default.

To test, you can build dart from source (use [v4.0 tag](https://github.com/dartsim/dart/releases/tag/v4.0) or [release-4.0 branch](https://github.com/dartsim/dart/tree/release-4.0)) or install libdart-core4-dev from the dartsim ppa (also requires libccd and fcl):
~~~
sudo apt-add-repository ppa:libccd-debs
sudo apt-add-repository ppa:fcl-debs
sudo apt-add-repository ppa:dartsim
sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install libdart-core4-dev
~~~

I still need to update the homebrew formula.

UPDATE: it is now required to build dart from the [release-4.0 branch](https://github.com/dartsim/dart/tree/release-4.0), as there are some fixes there that haven't been tagged and released yet.

DART 4.0 has been released. It improves support for universal and screw joints (partial fixes to #1096, #1011), joint springs (partial fix for #975) and complete fixes for #910, #1079, #1174.

DART 4.0 has a lot of API changes, so merging this pull request will make DART 4.0 the minimum required version. There is a minor ABI breakage in DARTLink.hh, but I have targeted this to the gazebo_3.1 branch since we have not yet released any debian packages that link against dart. If people think this is a bad idea, I will re-target to default.

To test, you can build dart from source (use v4.0 tag or release-4.0 branch) or install libdart-core4-dev from the dartsim ppa (also requires libccd and fcl):

sudo apt-add-repository ppa:fcl-debs
sudo apt-add-repository ppa:dartsim
sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install libdart-core4-dev

I still need to update the homebrew formula.

UPDATE: it is now required to build dart from the release-4.0 branch, as there are some fixes there that haven't been tagged and released yet.

title: DART 4.0 support
